The claim was published on Facebook on F: 2020, alongside a photo of a Ministry of Health advisory on preventing novel coronavirus.
The claim suggests that China: made Holi festival decorations, such as toy guns, colors, face masks, and artificial hair, are heavily used and may be infected with the novel coronavirus.
The World Health Organization: WHO) and the Toy Association of India have both stated that the virus does not survive for long on objects, making it highly unlikely for imported goods from China to remain infectious on arrival.
